text: Loiri Porto San Paolo (Lòiri Poltu Santu Pàulu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 3,407 people lived there. Its area is 118.52 km². It is 105 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Loiri Porto San Paolo
